name: Autocomplete
description: Autocomplete overlay for text inputs with keyboard navigation and theming.

use: you need suggestion popovers for text input.
you want append/replace behaviors for suggestions.
avoid: you need a full search or command palette (use `command`).

patterns.title: Replace word mode
patterns.code:
AutoComplete(
  suggestions: const ['hello_world', 'hello_flutter'],
  mode: AutoCompleteMode.replaceWord,
  child: TextField(),
)

accessibility: Ensure suggestions are readable and keyboard navigable.
dont: Trigger the popup for very short queries without filtering.
